data.SOURCE:
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Export Document Header'
define root view entity ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_HEAD
  as select from    zetr_t_r101                as Main
    left outer join I_CompanyCode              as Company          on Company.CompanyCode = Main.bukrs
    left outer join I_Customer_VH              as Customer         on Customer.BusinessPartner = Main.kunrg
    left outer join ZETR_DDL_I_DOC_TYPE        as DocumentType     on DocumentType.ExportType = Main.expty

    left outer join I_CustomerPaymentTermsText as PaymentTermsText on  PaymentTermsText.CustomerPaymentTerms = Main.pymty
                                                                   and PaymentTermsText.Language             = $session.system_language
    left outer join I_ShippingTypeText         as ShippingTypeText on  ShippingTypeText.ShippingType = Main.trnty
                                                                   and ShippingTypeText.Language     = $session.system_language


  composition [0..*] of ZETR_DDL_I_EXPORT_INVH as _InvoiceHeader
  composition [0..*] of ZETR_DDL_I_EXPORT_INVI as _InvoiceItem
  composition [0..*] of ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_TXT     as _Texts
  composition [0..*] of ZETR_DDL_I_BIL_DOC     as _BillingDocument

{
  key Main.filen                                as Filen,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CompanyCodeName' ]
      Main.expty                                as Expty,
      DocumentType.Description                  as ExptyName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CompanyCodeName' ]
      Main.bukrs                                as Bukrs,
      Company.CompanyCodeName                   as CompanyCodeName,
      Main.clsed                                as Clsed,
      Main.fldel                                as Fldel,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'CustomerName' ]
      Main.kunrg                                as Kunrg,
      Customer.CustomerName                     as CustomerName,
      case Main.isaccounting when 'X' then '3'
                                      else '1'
            end                                 as Status,
      case Main.isaccounting when 'X' then 'Muhasebeleşti'
                                      else 'Muhasebeleşmedi'
      end                                       as StatusText,
      Main.chind                                as Chind,

      Main.brgew_gewei                          as BrgewGewei,

      Main.brgew                                as Brgew,
      Main.ntgew_gewei                          as NtgewGewei,
      Main.ntgew                                as Ntgew,
      Main.gewei                                as Gewei,
      Main.volum                                as Volum,
      Main.voleh                                as Voleh,
      Main.descr                                as Descr,
      @Consumption.valueHelpDefault.display: false
      Main.bldat                                as Bldat,
      Main.extco                                as Extco,
      Main.desco                                as Desco,
      Main.extrg                                as Extrg,
      Main.desrg                                as Desrg,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'PaymentTermsName' ]
      @UI.textArrangement:#TEXT_FIRST
      Main.pymty                                as Pymty,
      PaymentTermsText.CustomerPaymentTermsName as PaymentTermsName,
      ShippingTypeText.ShippingTypeName         as ShippingTypeName,
      @ObjectModel.text.element: [ 'ShippingTypeName' ]
      @UI.textArrangement:#TEXT_FIRST
      Main.trnty                                as Trnty,
      Main.cuscd                                as Cuscd,
      Main.cusof                                as Cusof,
      Main.cofrp                                as Cofrp,
      Main.shpfr                                as Shpfr,
      Main.sfrrp                                as Sfrrp,
      Main.brofr                                as Brofr,
      Main.bfrrp                                as Bfrrp,
      Main.extfn                                as Extfn,
      Main.rexdt                                as Rexdt,
      Main.cedno                                as Cedno,
      Main.ceddt                                as Ceddt,
      Main.shpdt                                as Shpdt,
      Main.shpno                                as Shpno,
      Main.extdt                                as Extdt,
      Main.desdt                                as Desdt,
      Main.nopck                                as Nopck,
      Main.inc01                                as Inc01,
      Main.inc02                                as Inc02,
      Main.incno                                as Incno,
      Main.lcnum                                as Lcnum,
      Main.plaka                                as Plaka,
      Main.snrkp                                as Snrkp,
      Main.ucsno                                as Ucsno,
      Main.ucstr                                as Ucstr,
      Main.hzrtr                                as Hzrtr,
      Main.beyts                                as Beyts,
      Main.beysa                                as Beysa,
      Main.beyty                                as Beyty,
      Main.hatbl                                as Hatbl,
      Main.gemia                                as Gemia,
      Main.sefno                                as Sefno,
      Main.sbeyt                                as Sbeyt,
      Main.bolnumber                            as Bolnumber,
      Main.erdat                                as Erdat,
      Main.erzet                                as Erzet,
      Main.ernam                                as Ernam,
      Main.aedat                                as Aedat,
      Main.aezet                                as Aezet,
      Main.aenam                                as Aenam,
      Main.reffn                                as Reffn,
      Main.bankl                                as Bankl,
      Main.iban                                 as Iban,
      Main.isaccounting                         as IsAccounting,
      Main.eori                                 as Eori,
      Main.contractno                           as ContractNo,
      Main.beyam                                as Beyam,
      Main.beysa                                as Beysa2,

      _InvoiceHeader,
      _InvoiceItem,
      _Texts,
      _BillingDocument
}
where
  Main.isdeleted = ''
/*+[internal] {
"BASEINFO":
{
"FROM":
[
"I_COMPANYCODE",
"I_CUSTOMERPAYMENTTERMSTEXT",
"I_CUSTOMER_VH",
"I_SHIPPINGTYPETEXT",
"ZETR_DDL_I_DOC_TYPE",
"ZETR_T_R101"
],
"ASSOCIATED":
[
"ZETR_DDL_I_BIL_DOC",
"ZETR_DDL_I_EXPORT_INVH",
"ZETR_DDL_I_EXPORT_INVI",
"ZETR_DDL_I_EXP_TXT"
],
"BASE":
[],
"ANNO_REF":
[],
"SCALAR_FUNCTION":
[],
"VERSION":0,
"ANNOREF_EVALUATION_ERROR":""
}
}*/
